team11

Class DBUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • team11.DBUtil

  • public class DBUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Database connection utility class, in order to easy connect database and close connection.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vikas Matcha, Shijian(Tim) Xu

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()

      • get

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> get(java.sql.Connection conn,
                                                          java.lang.String statement,
                                                          java.lang.String[] column,
                                                          java.lang.String[] query)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Reading data from database.
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection object of current connection to database.
        statement - Basic SQL statement, reminds ? as input part.
        column - Requirement column of data table.
        query - Value which fill into ? in SQL statement.
        Returns:
        ArrayList
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw connection error.

      • post

        public static void post(java.sql.Connection conn,
                        java.lang.String statement,
                        java.lang.String[] a)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Post statement to database.
        Parameters:
        conn - Connection object of current connection to database.
        statement - Basic SQL statement, reminds ? as input part.
        a - Value which fill into ? in SQL statement.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throw connection error.
